rooms.description: North-facing entrance hall designed as per Vastu for auspicious energy. Includes built-in seating and display areas.
Spacious living area with colonial aesthetics, featuring large windows facing the courtyard to maximize natural light.
Modern dining space integrated within the living room for a seamless flow.
Functional kitchen with colonial design elements. Vastu-compliant placement near service area and away from main entrance.
Penthouse style master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and attached walk-in closet. North-east placement for positive energy.
Cozy guest room designed with colonial detailing and ample storage solutions.
Multi-functional study room offering quiet space; positioned to receive balanced light from the central courtyard.
Private en-suite bathroom adjoining master bedroom. Minimalist design with colonial fixtures and ample ventilation.
Open-air courtyard acting as a focal point for natural light and fresh air circulation, integrating Vastu principles to ensure positive energy flow throughout the villa.
Dedicated fitness area designed with soundproofing and modern equipment. Located in a private wing for privacy and security.
Small living space for staff; includes basic amenities and located close to service areas yet ensuring privacy. Aligned with local building norms.

openings.description: North-facing door aligning with Vastu principles for auspicious entry. Made of high-quality wood with colonial detailing.
Separate entrance for servant's quarters and service area, ensuring privacy while adhering to local safety norms.
Large windows integrated into the living room, bedrooms, and kitchen to maximize natural light and ventilation according to Vastu principles.
